code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    C1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    C2[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    C3[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    C4[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    C5[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  end

  subgraph Server[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    S1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    S2{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
    S3[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    S4[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    S5[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    S6[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
